about-description-one: I'm a Frontend developer with a focus on Backend. I have been working in the IT field since 2020. From 2019 - 2020, he began self-education in the IT field, took a couple of courses on Udemy in JavaScript.
about-description-two: As I studied, I began to independently search for and use new technologies to improve the classification in the IT field. I try to use new technologies to improve performance in my projects. I am self-taught, and I try to develop in this area.
